snippet: Marc Krupanski of the Open Society Justice Initiative writes that stop-and-search data “needs to be interpreted and used properly by the police.”
lead_paragraph: Marc Krupanski of the Open Society Justice Initiative writes that stop-and-search data “needs to be interpreted and used properly by the police.”

headline.main: How the Police Should Use Stop-and-Search Data
headline.print_headline: How the Police Should Use Stop-and-Search Data
